contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 4, 1906 D Beeston Contest
Beeston Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
beeston-contest
None
Don Quixote
Rugby Football Ground, Beeston, Nottinghamshire Promoted by Beeston Excelsior Prize Band 1st prize £5, 2nd prize £3, 3rd prize £2, 4th prize £1 divided between Long Eaton Town and Beeston Humber. 6 bands competed. On mounting the stand to play, band #1, Beeston Humber, the stand being 5 foot off the ground, it gave way. Fortunately no one was hurt, merely given a fright and shaken - which told somewhat on their playing!
March 10, 2012, 7:23 a.m. Sept. 15, 2018, 8:12 a.m.
1 Clowne Silver G. W. Bowes
2 Bestwood Colliery George Hames
3 Nottingham Railway City R. Mills
4 Beeston Humber J. Hartley
4 Long Eaton Town Band Sam Taylor
6 Stapleford Town C. Atkin
